Segment.name: DMI
Segment.comment: To provide information related to the data maintenance request number in the electronic form of the X12 standards

Field.name: MaintenanceOperationCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type maintenance operation

Field.name: DataMaintenanceNumber
Field.comment: The data maintenance number assigned by the Data Interchange Standards Association (DISA)

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

Field.name: PostalCode
Field.comment: Code defining international postal zone code excluding punctuation and blanks (zip code for United States)

Field.name: CommunicationNumberQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of communication number

Field.name: CommunicationNumber
Field.comment: Complete communications number including country or area code when applicable

Field.name: NoteIdentificationNumber
Field.comment: A number providing a reference to a segment or file which contains notes or comments related to X12 standards documentation
